Package org.asoem.greyfish.core.agent

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionExecutionStrategyFactory<C>
    A factory for instances of ActionScheduler.
    ActionScheduler<C>
    An ActionScheduler defines how instances of AgentAction get executed by the Agent and logs the execution history.
    Agent<C extends Context<?,?>>
    An Agent which is the basic unit of a DiscreteTimeEnvironment.
    AgentComponent<C>  
    AgentNode  
    AgentType
    An AgentType is an attribute for an agent.
    BasicContext<S extends DiscreteTimeEnvironment<A>,A extends Agent<?>>
    A SimulationContext is the link between an Agent and a DiscreteTimeEnvironment.
    CloneFactory<A extends Agent<?>>  
    ComponentMessage  
    Context<S extends Environment<A>,A extends Agent<?>>  
    ContextFactory<S extends DiscreteTimeEnvironment<A>,A extends Agent<?>>
    A factory for instances of org.asoem.greyfish.core.agent.SimulationContext
    PropertyFunction<P,C,T>  
    SpatialAgent<A extends SpatialAgent<A,C,P,?>,C extends Context<?,A>,P extends org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.Object2D,AC extends AgentContext<A>>
    An agent for spatial simulations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAgent<A extends Agent<C>,C extends BasicContext<?,A>,AC extends AgentContext<A>>
    This class provides a skeletal implementation of the Agent interface.
    AbstractSpatialAgent<A extends SpatialAgent<A,BasicContext<S,A>,P,?>,S extends SpatialEnvironment2D<A,?>,P extends org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.Object2D,AC extends AgentContext<A>>
    Base implementation of a spatial agent
    Agents
    A collection of helper functions dealing with agents.
    BasicAgentType  
    CreateRecombinedChromosome  
    DefaultActionScheduler<A extends Agent<?>,C extends AgentContext<A>>
    The default implementation of an ActionExecutionStrategy.
    DefaultActiveContext<S extends DiscreteTimeEnvironment<A>,A extends Agent<?>>
    A getSimulation context which indicates an active state of an agent.
    DefaultAgentContext<A extends Agent<?>>  
    DefaultContextFactory<S extends DiscreteTimeEnvironment<A>,A extends Agent<?>>
    Default implementation of SimulationContextFactory.
    PropertySetRequest  
    PropertyValueRequest
    A message to request a trait value from an agent.
    RequestAllTraitValues
    Agents should respond to this message with a map of trait names to their values.
